short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send the key word to thepiratebay, and search it.
short.zh_TW: 傳送關鍵字到 thepiratebay 中搜尋

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can select the keyword from your browser, and easy send to Thepiratebay via right click.
It will show search result on new chrome tab.
